channel.title: Fix logout teleport?
channel.description: Hey guys i made a ::jail command and everything works as planne. i type ::jail then they go to jail cell :D and then when they try to tele out says they are tbed, any ways i recently discovered that if u loggout wile in jailed and logg back in you can tele out like nothing has happend. :|.... So if any one has any ideas to help me fix will help me alot! thanks alot :)

item.title: Fix logout teleport?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:3, topic:365630”]Do you really think that a jail is going to work? Once they get jailed they’ll just go to a new server. You’re adding pointless features that; Even if it was made properly would still be flawed. My suggestion… Just fuckin’ ban them.[/quote]Lol’d irl. That’s so true man. But jail would work if the server had like 500+ players online and they wanted to come back to the fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Fix logout teleport?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Do you really think that a jail is going to work? Once they get jailed they’ll just go to a new server. You’re adding pointless features that; Even if it was made properly would still be flawed. My suggestion… Just fuckin’ ban them.

item.title: Fix logout teleport?
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Hmm…just off the top of my head, you could say if the coordinates are in your jail (I don’t know what the actual coordinates are for your jail) Then teleblock = true; or something like that. Keep in mind, this is just a sketch of how to do something like that.

Read full topic
